#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	long long t;
	long long N,K,ak;
	cin >> t;
	
	while(t--)
	{
		long long max = -1; 
		cin >> N >> K;
		for (int i = 1; i <= K; i++)
		{
			cin >> ak;
			if (max < ak)
				max = ak;		  		
		}
		long long res = 1.0;
		for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++)
		{
			res = (res * i) % max;
		}
		
		cout << res << endl;
	}
	 
	return 0;
}
